title.rendered: VINHOMES SPORTIA’S FRUITION ON SIGHT, NEWTECONS HAD ITS PRESTIGE PROVEN TO THE OWNER

content.rendered:
Vinhomes Sportia Smart City – a new centre in West of Hanoi – is one of the first products of Vinhomes in particular and Vingroup in general to incorporate edge-cutting technologies and provide technological products that lead the market. Especially, a comprehensive Smart Ecosystem based on 4 core axes: Smart security, smart operation, smart community, smart apartment, promises a dynamic, modern and trendy life.

Overview of Vinhomes Sportia project

Kicked off in late 2018, the project involves Newtecons as the General Contractor for the gross floor area of 2,100 square meters including tower H9 with 34 upground floors and 1 basement, and H8 tower with 38 upground floors and 1 basement. Vinhomes Sportia is another project beside the successful Vinhomes Ocean Park that is imprinted with Newtecons’ signature. The project has just been completed of acceptance and handover per schedule. 

Newtecons constructed tower H9 with 34 upground floors and 1 basement, and tower H8 with 35 upground floors and 1 basement

By transcending strict requirements on progress and quality, Newtecons once again affirmed its prestige and became the optimal choice for the Owner in major projects.

The Site Management Board is confident to complete the project satisfactory to the Owner
